stimulusHtml: In the xy-plane, how many points on the curve y2+x2=3âˆ’xy have horizontal or vertical tangent lines?
choicesHtml: No points have vertical tangent lines, and two points have horizontal tangent lines.
One point has a vertical tangent line, and one point has a horizontal tangent line.
Two points have vertical tangent lines, and two points have horizontal tangent lines.
No points have vertical tangent lines, and no points have horizontal tangent lines.
